What is the filename of the largest file in the cloud drive?

I need to find the largest file in the cloud drive and its filename. To do this, I will first list all files in the cloud drive using the `list_files` function. Then, I will identify the largest file among them.

The search_files_by_filename function did not return any results. This could mean that the file 'example.txt' does not exist in the cloud drive or there was an error in the search. To confirm, I will use the list_files function to retrieve all files in the cloud drive and see if 'example.txt' is among them.
